statements: SELECT project_name, carbon_saved FROM CarbonOffsetProjects;
SELECT * FROM CarbonOffsetProjects WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT project_description, start_date FROM CarbonOffsetProjects WHERE carbon_saved >= 1000;
SELECT project_name, end_date FROM CarbonOffsetProjects WHERE project_id IN (2, 4, 6);
SELECT * FROM CarbonOffsetProjects ORDER BY start_date DESC, project_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM CarbonOffsetProjects WHERE carbon_saved > 500 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT project_id, project_name FROM CarbonOffsetProjects WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_name, project_description, carbon_saved FROM CarbonOffsetProjects WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-01';
SELECT * FROM CarbonOffsetProjects WHERE project_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT project_id, project_name, carbon_saved FROM CarbonOffsetProjects WHERE carbon_saved < 1000 ORDER BY project_name ASC;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM carbon_offset_projects;
SELECT efficiency_rating, greenhouse_gas_type FROM carbon_offset_projects;
SELECT * FROM project_monitoring;
SELECT monitoring_date, carbon_offset_metric FROM project_monitoring;
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, end_date, greenhouse_gas_type, efficiency_rating FROM carbon_offset_projects;
SELECT * FROM carbon_offset_projects;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM carbon_offset_projects WHERE efficiency_rating >= 80;
SELECT project_name, greenhouse_gas_type, efficiency_rating FROM carbon_offset_projects ORDER BY greenhouse_gas_type DESC;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date, efficiency_rating FROM carbon_offset_projects WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' AND end_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT cp.project_name, pm.monitoring_date, pm.carbon_offset_metric FROM carbon_offset_projects cp INNER JOIN project_monitoring pm ON cp.project_id = pm.project_id;
SELECT * FROM carbon_offset_projects;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM carbon_offset_projects;
SELECT project_id, project_name, carbon_offset_amount FROM carbon_offset_projects;
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, end_date, carbon_offset_amount FROM carbon_offset_projects WHERE carbon_offset_amount > 500;
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, end_date, carbon_offset_amount FROM carbon_offset_projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM carbon_offset_projects;
SELECT project_name, carbon_offset_amount FROM carbon_offset_projects WHERE carbon_offset_amount > 1000;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM carbon_offset_projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT partner_name, partner_type FROM project_partners INNER JOIN carbon_offset_projects ON project_partners.project_id = carbon_offset_projects.project_id;

SELECT project_name, measurement_date, efficiency_score, emissions_reduction FROM carbon_offset_projects JOIN project_measurements ON carbon_offset_projects.project_id = project_measurements.project_id WHERE efficiency_score > 3.5 ORDER BY measurement_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM carbon_projects;
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date FROM carbon_projects WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM carbon_projects WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM offset_data ORDER BY offset_date DESC;
SELECT partner_name, partnership_date FROM project_partners ORDER BY partner_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM carbon_projects LIMIT 5;
SELECT project_name, start_date FROM carbon_projects WHERE project_id > 5;
SELECT project_id, project_name, end_date FROM carbon_projects WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM offset_data ORDER BY offset_amount DESC, offset_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT project_name, metric_name, metric_value FROM carbon_projects JOIN project_metrics ON carbon_projects.project_id = project_metrics.project_id WHERE carbon_projects.project_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM CarbonOffsetProjects;
SELECT project_name, project_type, project_location FROM CarbonOffsetProjects WHERE project_status = 'Completed';
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM CarbonOffsetProjects WHERE project_type = 'Renewable Energy';
SELECT project_name, project_location, project_status FROM CarbonOffsetProjects ORDER BY project_location ASC;
SELECT project_name, project_type, project_status FROM CarbonOffsetProjects WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM CarbonOffsetProjects ORDER BY project_name DESC, project_location ASC;
SELECT project_name, project_type, start_date FROM CarbonOffsetProjects WHERE project_status = 'Active';
SELECT p.project_name, COUNT(m.metric_name) AS num_metrics FROM CarbonOffsetProjects p JOIN ProjectMetrics m ON p.project_id = m.project_id GROUP BY p.project_name;
SELECT p.project_name, SUM(e.expense_amount) AS total_expenses FROM CarbonOffsetProjects p JOIN ProjectExpenses e ON p.project_id = e.project_id GROUP BY p.project_name HAVING total_expenses > 1000;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT pp.participant_role) AS unique_roles FROM ProjectParticipants pp;
